context.p: provides numerous content, classification and communication features on the details view of each card.

step.cmd: Click a card to open its details view.
Add or edit content on the card.

choices.choice: If you want to edit the card title, click the title (1).
Click (2) and type the card description. You can use markdown.
Assign members to the card, add labels, add a due date, create an interactive checklist, add attachments (3)
Subscribe to the card, if you are not already monitoring it, or vote for the card (4)
Write comments and replies to other members (5)

step.cmd: If you want to delete a card, click .
step.info: Items are not deleted, only archived in .

step.cmd: To close the card, click the close (X) button.
